alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:06PM MST until January 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Snow and blowing snow will reduce visibility to a quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Washington County
